Pilum Class Close Escort (Military Starship)

The Pilum is designed to meet the Imperial Navy standard requirements of Jump-4 and 4-G acceleration. A substantial number of Pilum class escorts remain in Imperial service, although almost all new construction is for various planetary navies.
